userAgreement.title: DON-VIP User Agreement
userAgreement.introduction: This document defines the terms of use for DON-VIP services and the rights and obligations of Users. Please read the terms carefully before using the site.

content.p1_1: 1.1. This User Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") governs the relationship between the Administration of the "DON-VIP" website (hereinafter referred to as the "Administration") and the individual using the website https://don-vip.com/ (hereinafter referred to as the "User").
content.p1_2: 1.2. By using the website, the User confirms that they have read and agree to the terms of this Agreement. If you disagree with the terms, the User must stop using the website.

content.info: Registration is required for full use of the service. Please provide accurate information and keep your account credentials secure.
